ztfy.hplskin package

What is ztfy.hplskin ?
======================

ztfy.hplskin is a custom skin for a ztfy.blog based web site.
It was designed at first to be used in 'http://www.ulthar.net' website, a french
site dedicated to H.P.Lovecraft and Cthulhu mythos.


How to use ztfy.hplskin ?
=========================

A set of ztfy.hplskin usage are given as doctests in ztfy/hplskin/doctests/README.txt
